Brahma Kumaris is a worldwide spiritual movement, dedicated to personal transformation and world renewal through Rajyoga Meditation. Founded in India in 1937, Brahma Kumaris has spread to over 110 countries on all continents and has had an extensive impact in many sectors as an international NGO.

#live #song #bksurajbhai #modi #rss #hindu #meditation 

Brahma Kumaris is a worldwide spiritual movement led by women, dedicated to personal transformation and world renewal through Rajyoga Meditation. Founded in India in 1937, Brahma Kumaris has spread to over 110 countries on all continents and has had an extensive impact in many sectors as an international NGO.

title: Vedika | Content Creator | Sharing her Experience @brahmakumaris ‚Äã| Empowering The Self
description:
‡§ì‡§Æ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡•§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§µ‡•á‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§è‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Ç‡•§

Being a 26-year-old, when I spoke to my friends about it ‚Äî that I am going for a spiritual retreat organized by the Brahma Kumaris organization ‚Äî

one question that many of us are asked and we ask others also is: ‚ÄúWhy are you going there?
‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§´ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ? ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•â‡§¨‡•ç‡§≤‡§Æ ‡§Ü ‡§ó‡§à? ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡•â‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à, ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§§‡•Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à?‚Äù

‡§§‡•ã ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à‡•§ ‡§Æ‡§§‡§≤‡§¨ ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§´ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§®‡•á‡§ó‡•á‡§ü‡§ø‡§µ ‡§™‡•â‡§á‡§Ç‡§ü ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•â‡§≤‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§

title: Ep 20 - Spiritual and Indigenous Voices for the Earth | Sister Jayanti, Abigail Quic | ClimateWisdom
description:
Climate Wisdom from COP30 | Brahma Kumaris

Topic: Spiritual and Indigenous Voices for the Earth
‚Ä¢ Sister Jayanti, Add. Admin. Head of the Brahma Kumaris
‚Ä¢ Abigail Quic, Co-Executive Dir. SERES
‚Ä¢ Anchor: Sonja Ohlsson, Brahma Kumaris

Join us for an enlightening and transformative experience at the Climate Wisdom from COP30 LIVE panel discussion, hosted by the Brahma Kumaris Environment Initiative. In this session, we bring you powerful insights and inspirational stories from global change-makers who are shaping the future of our planet.

Hear first-hand accounts of the transformative moments, breakthroughs, and innovative solutions shared at COP30, tackling some of the most pressing climate challenges of our time. This event promises to empower and inspire individuals and organizations committed to creating a sustainable and resilient future.

Tune in for a deep dive into the wisdom and lessons from COP30 that highlight the importance of collective action, sustainability, and conscious living. Let‚Äôs work together to bring about positive change for a greener, more sustainable world.

title: Ep 18 - Building the Future We Choose | Sister Jayanti, Budi Tjahjono | Climate Wisdom from COP 30
description:
Climate Wisdom from COP30' | Brahma Kumaris

Topic: Building the Future We Choose
‚Ä¢ Sister Jayanti, Add. Admin. Head of the Brahma Kumaris
‚Ä¢ Budi Tjahjono, Advocacy Director Franciscans International
‚Ä¢ Anchor: Sonja Ohlsson, Brahma Kumaris

Join us for an enlightening and transformative experience at the Climate Wisdom from COP30 LIVE panel discussion, hosted by the Brahma Kumaris Environment Initiative. In this session, we bring you powerful insights and inspirational stories from global change-makers who are shaping the future of our planet.

Hear first-hand accounts of the transformative moments, breakthroughs, and innovative solutions shared at COP30, tackling some of the most pressing climate challenges of our time. This event promises to empower and inspire individuals and organizations committed to creating a sustainable and resilient future.

Tune in for a deep dive into the wisdom and lessons from COP30 that highlight the importance of collective action, sustainability, and conscious living. Let‚Äôs work together to bring about positive change for a greener, more sustainable world.

title: Ep 16 - Global Solidarity and Climate Justice | Sister Jayanti, Rev Fletcher Harper | Climate Wisdom
description:
Climate Wisdom from COP30' | Brahma Kumaris

Topic: Global Solidarity and Climate Justice
‚Ä¢ Sister Jayanti, Add. Admin. Head of the Brahma Kumaris
‚Ä¢ The Rev. Fletcher Harper, Executive Director GreenFaith
‚Ä¢ Anchor: Golo Pilz, Adviser Renewable Energy Brahma Kumaris

Join us for an enlightening and transformative experience at the Climate Wisdom from COP30 LIVE panel discussion, hosted by the Brahma Kumaris Environment Initiative. In this session, we bring you powerful insights and inspirational stories from global change-makers who are shaping the future of our planet.

Hear first-hand accounts of the transformative moments, breakthroughs, and innovative solutions shared at COP30, tackling some of the most pressing climate challenges of our time. This event promises to empower and inspire individuals and organizations committed to creating a sustainable and resilient future.

Tune in for a deep dive into the wisdom and lessons from COP30 that highlight the importance of collective action, sustainability, and conscious living. Let‚Äôs work together to bring about positive change for a greener, more sustainable world.

title: Ep 14 - Inner Resilience, Planetary Renewal | Maureen, Lindsey Fielder Cook | Climate Wisdom | COP30
description:
Climate Wisdom from COP30 | Brahma Kumaris

Topic: Inner Resilience, Planetary Renewal
‚Ä¢ Maureen Goodman, Director Brahma Kumaris, UK
‚Ä¢ Lindsey Fielder Cook, Repr. Climate Change, Quaker UN Office
‚Ä¢ Anchor: Golo Pilz, Adviser Renewable Energy, Brahma Kumaris

Join us for an enlightening and transformative experience at the Climate Wisdom from COP30 LIVE panel discussion, hosted by the Brahma Kumaris Environment Initiative. In this session, we bring you powerful insights and inspirational stories from global change-makers who are shaping the future of our planet.

Hear first-hand accounts of the transformative moments, breakthroughs, and innovative solutions shared at COP30, tackling some of the most pressing climate challenges of our time. This event promises to empower and inspire individuals and organizations committed to creating a sustainable and resilient future.

Tune in for a deep dive into the wisdom and lessons from COP30 that highlight the importance of collective action, sustainability, and conscious living. Let‚Äôs work together to bring about positive change for a greener, more sustainable world.

#song #motivation #brahmakumaris #madhubannews #success  

Brahma Kumaris is a worldwide spiritual movement led by women, dedicated to personal transformation and world renewal through Rajyoga Meditation. Founded in India in 1937, Brahma Kumaris has spread to over 110 countries on all continents and has had an extensive impact in many sectors as an international NGO.

title: Ep 12 - Women Leading with Ethics | Maureen Goodman, Laura Cook | Climate Wisdom from COP30 #belem
description:
Climate Wisdom from COP30' | Brahma Kumaris

Topic: Women Leading with Ethics in Climate Action
‚Ä¢ Maureen Goodman, Director Brahma Kumaris, UK
‚Ä¢ Laura Cook, Senior Strategist, Project Dandelion 
‚Ä¢ Anchor: Sonja Ohlsson, Brahma Kumaris

Join us for an enlightening and transformative experience at the Climate Wisdom from COP30 LIVE panel discussion, hosted by the Brahma Kumaris Environment Initiative. title: Anita Goyal from London | Sharing her Experience @brahmakumaris ‚Äã
description:
Hi, my name is Anita Goyal, and this is my first time in Mount Abu. I'm from London and here with my family. This experience has been absolutely incredible, and I'm so pleased to be here. It really is an honor to be here.

For me, hearing the speakers ‚Äî Sister Shivani, Bala Bhai, and many other accomplished speakers ‚Äî who share their wisdom and teachings has been truly inspiring. What I‚Äôve learned most is how to reflect, recharge, and rethink the way I‚Äôm living my life, and also to understand the impact it has on our family. So,I‚Äôll implement some of those changes because I think they‚Äôll be so valuable for so many people.

Back home, I‚Äôm a philanthropist and also a social innovator, and we‚Äôve created a program called Inner Spark, which offers free personal development workshops for schools. While I‚Äôve been here, I‚Äôve been really excited about exploring how these teachings can also be implemented in schools in the UK ‚Äî to benefit young people in building their mindset, resilience,  and also taking their experience with life to the next level. I think this is much needed in the world, and I truly believe that what I‚Äôve learned here, I can take back to our teams and help enroll them to make our Inner Spark workshops deliver at their very best.
This has been incredible in every aspect of my life. It‚Äôs been life-changing for me ‚Äî for my well-being ‚Äî and it helps me complete my wheel of life really well at the spiritual level.
Thank you.
When asked to describe her experience in one word, she smiled and said, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs bliss ‚Äîserenity and peace.

description:

Join us for an enlightening and transformative experience at the Climate Wisdom from COP30 LIVE panel discussion, hosted by the Brahma Kumaris Environment Initiative. title: Suhani Bhartia| Intern @ Samusng R&D | Sharing her Experience @brahmakumaris ‚Äã
description:
I am working with Samsung as an intern. I did my graduation recently from Ramjas College, Delhi University, in B.Com (Hons.). It‚Äôs an absolute pleasure to be at this conference. I had a lovely time here.
 To share a bit about myself ‚Äî my mom has been in this knowledge for a while. I first visited Mount Abu when I was in 10th standard. Earlier, I was a little skeptical. I used to be that rebellious kid who wouldn‚Äôt listen to her mother.
Fast forward to today ‚Äî I was absolutely excited to be here. Now, as I sit here, I feel a little sense of void knowing that I have to leave this place, but at the same time, a sense of fulfillment too, because I have gained something much more valuable. I am no longer that rebellious kid.
My mom shared that the seed planted during my childhood was an important part of my journey, and now that seed has sprouted. I feel eternally grateful to be here.
It has been an absolutely fun and fulfilling experience ‚Äî the sessions were wonderful, the day was fully packed, and it has truly been a lovely period all this while.
I consider myself a person who has a soft corner for spicy food and similar dishes.But whenever I come to this campus, I‚Äôm not at all keen on having that kind of food. Instead, I eagerly look forward to the food prepared here. I absolutely love it ‚Äî the taste, the vibrations, and the sense of contentment it brings.
The sessions were emotionally and spiritually fulfilling, and I have no words to express how grateful I feel to be here. I look forward to many more such sessions in the future.
So that is about me. Thank you. Om Shanti.


Brahma Kumaris is a worldwide spiritual movement led by women, dedicated to personal transformation and world renewal through Rajyoga Meditation. Founded in India in 1937, Brahma Kumaris has spread to over 110 countries on all continents and has had an extensive impact in many sectors as an international NGO.

title: Siddharth Agrawal | Director @ Flavour Trove | Sharing Experience @brahmakumaris
description:
Hi, I am Sidharth. I am a person who works with plants and phytochemistry, secondary plant compounds. I'm based in Bangalore. When I learned about this particular program, I was very curious to understand. It helped me understand a lot with regard to what the constitution of our world is. What's the constitution of our body, our mind?

At the theoretical level, what are the differences? What we assumed, what the reality is. Just by that mere knowledge helps you understand universal insights into why an exindividual behaves in a certain manner. It helps to practice more harmony. It becomes very easy for you to visualize how life could be more serene, more harmonious with the nature around you. I got introduced to meditation or the concept of meditations to various schools of thoughts. I practiced vipasana for some time. studied Sankhya for some time and then eventually I was given this opportunity to experience raj yoga here.

I think through all mediums we understand that the universality of the supreme. I would say knowledge great amount of knowledge. The only thing I can say is being in a great classroom great course more than anything else.

#PMModi #BrahmaKumaris #ShantiShikhar #NavaRaipur #‡§®‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ã‡§¶‡•Ä #‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ï‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú #‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§∂‡§ø‡§ñ‡§∞ #‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó #Meditation #SpiritualIndia #Live

Witness history in the making! Grand inauguration of Shanti Shikhar, Academy for a Peaceful World, a monumental new meditation and spiritual retreat center established by Brahma Kumaris in Nava Raipur, Chhattisgarh.

This center is dedicated to teaching Rajyoga meditation and providing spiritual knowledge for self-transformation and world renewal.

Inauguration by: Shri Narendra Modi, Prime Minister of India

Date & Time: Saturday, November 1, 2025, 10:00 AM IST.

Special Guests will include:
* Honorable Governor of Chhattisgarh, Shri Ramen Deka Ji
* Honorable Chief Minister, Shri Vishnu Deo Sai Ji
* Honorable Speaker of the Legislative Assembly, Dr. Raman Singh Ji
* Senior Rajyoginis & Rajyogis, including Rajyogini Jayanti Didi Ji, Rajyogi Mrityunjay Bhai Ji, and Rajyogini Hema Didi Ji.

Don't miss this landmark event! Subscribe to our channel and hit the notification bell to be alerted when the live stream begins!

description:
‚ú® Mindful Moments presents a heart-touching conversation with Nawab Kazim Ali Khan of Rampur, where he beautifully shares the ethical values and cultural heritage of the Rampur royal family.

In this inspiring talk, Nawab Sahab reflects on how humanity was considered the truest form of worship and how religious harmony was the foundation of their way of life. His words remind us that beyond rituals and faiths, it is compassion, respect, and unity that truly define divinity.

Themed ‚ÄúReviving the Culture of Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam ‚Äì One Earth, One Family,‚Äù this session highlights the essence of global brotherhood, shared responsibility, and spiritual values as the foundation for a harmonious world.

This grand session features divine blessings, cultural performances, and thought-provoking insights from global leaders, environmentalists, and spiritual mentors.

‚ú® Rajyogini BK Jayanti Didi ‚Äî Addl. Chief of Brahma Kumaris

‚ú® Shri B.Y. Raghavendra ‚Äî Hon‚Äôble MP, Lok Sabha, Karnataka
‚ú® Shri R.B. Timmappur ‚Äî Hon‚Äôble Minister of Excise, Govt. of Karnataka
and many other distinguished guests and performers.

title: Plenary Session 1 | Cooperation & Mutual Trust | Media as a Catalyst for Peace | Global Summit 2025
description:

title: Spiritual Talk 1 | Healing the Earth by Healing the Self | Rajyogini BK Jayanti | Global Summit 2025
description:
Join Rajyogini BK Jayanti Didi for Spiritual Talk 1 at the Global Summit 2025, Shantivan, Abu Road, Rajasthan. 

This session focuses on how healing ourselves can contribute to healing the Earth. Explore the spiritual connection between inner transformation and environmental harmony, and discover practical insights to live consciously for a sustainable and peaceful world.

Session Details:
üìÖ Date: 10th October 2025
üïî Time: 5:00 PM IST
üìç Venue: Diamond Hall, Shantivan, Abu Road

üí´ Key Takeaways:
- Learn the link between personal healing and environmental well-being.
- Cultivate inner peace to positively impact the world around you.
- Embrace practical spiritual wisdom for daily living and sustainability.

title: Moments & Memories - Empowering the Self Retreat - October 2025 - Brahma Kumaris - Mansarovar
description:
The Brahma Kumaris Headquarters at Mansarovar, Mount Abu hosted a powerful spiritual retreat for global IT leaders from 3rd to 6th October 2025. This unique gathering brought together over 500 senior professionals from more than 150  renowned companies across the world, all with a shared intent: to pause, reflect, and reconnect with their inner self.

In today‚Äôs fast-paced tech-driven world, leadership demands not just intelligence, but emotional resilience, spiritual clarity, and inner strength. This retreat offered just that ‚Äî a rare opportunity for leaders to step back from their roles and rediscover their role as a soul.

Highlights of the Retreat:

Guided Rajyoga Meditation Sessions that brought stillness and mental clarity
Keynote sessions by senior Rajyogis on leadership, values, and decision-making through spiritual intelligence
Dialogue circles and experience sharing among leaders from top tech firms
Nature walks, soulful music, and digital detox 
Personal interactions with senior BK mentors for deeper insights on karma, mind, and relationships
The retreat echoed with stillness, strength, and silence, leaving participants rejuvenated and inspired to bring values-based leadership back to their companies.

All Video Playlist - Empowering the Self Retreat:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5kAxoG6fPDi7kdRcroQI_vGPJQi2RWNq

Experience with Brahma Kumaris :
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5kAxoG6fPDiwXXVagF8qFx_iIqqdvX1w

Brahma Kumaris is a worldwide spiritual movement led by women, dedicated to personal transformation and world renewal through Rajyoga Meditation. Founded in India in 1937, Brahma Kumaris has spread to over 110 countries on all continents and has had an extensive impact in many sectors as an international NGO.

title: Time to Meditate ‚Äì Meditation App & Portal for All Devices | Brahma Kumaris
description:
Begin your inner journey with Rajyoga meditations from Brahma Kumaris, the world‚Äôs largest spiritual organization. This app offers guided meditations, habit tracking, and personal growth tools that help reduce stress, improve focus, and deepen spiritual awareness.
Unlike generic meditation apps, this platform provides age-specific meditation experiences with specific situation on each age and powerful habit analytics‚Äîall in a modern, calming design.

To Install on Android Phone - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.official.brahmakumaris&hl=en
To install in Iphone or Desktop or Laptop or any other phone : open in any browser and go to setting and add to Home Screen, it will be Progressive webapp which is same as application in android:

Apple Device : To install a PWA on an iPhone, open the website in Safari, tap the Share button (the square with an arrow pointing up), select Add to Home Screen, and then tap Add in the top right corner to confirm the installation

üå± Age-Specific Guided Meditations
12‚Äì24 (Students & Youth): Overcome exam stress, peer pressure & identity struggles.
25‚Äì35 (Young Professionals): Balance career, relationships & emotional challenges.
36‚Äì50 (Mature Adults): Create stability, manage family responsibilities & stress.
50+ (Wisdom Years): Experience deeper peace, contentment & spiritual connection.

üéß Immersive Meditation Experience
High-quality guided audio & video meditations
Rich commentary with step-by-step instructions
Multi-language support for global users
Modern audio player with waveform visuals

üë®‚Äçüè´ Learn from Rajyoga Experts
Meditations led by experienced Brahma Kumaris teachers
Explore more content from your favorite guide

üìä Track Your Spiritual Growth
Daily meditation habit tracker with colorful charts
Streak counter & success rate analytics
Personal habit score (0‚Äì100) for consistency
Recognition badges & milestones for regular practice
Smart goals: 5-min daily OR complete any full meditation

‚ù§Ô∏è Social & Discovery Features
Save & like your favorite meditations
Share transformative practices with friends
Discover trending & recommended meditations
Advanced filtering by teacher, category, or duration

üåü Benefits of Rajyoga Meditation
Reduce stress & anxiety naturally
Improve sleep quality & relaxation
Enhance focus, concentration & clarity
Strengthen relationships with peace & empathy
Develop emotional balance & self-awareness
Experience inner power, positivity & harmony

Start your meditation journey today with just 5 minutes daily.
With It‚Äôs Time to Meditate, discover how Brahma Kumaris Rajyoga can bring lasting peace, clarity, and joy into your life.

‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤‡§® | ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡•à‡§§‡§ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ - ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ | ‡§Ü‡§®‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§µ‡§∞, ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§µ‡§® | 12 ‡§∏‡•á 15 ‡§∏‡§ø‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞ 2025
‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ï - ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§ú‡•ç‡§û ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§§‡§•‡§æ ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ï‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§â‡§Ç‡§ü ‡§Ü‡§¨‡•Ç,
The Politicians‚Äô Service Wing (PSW) of the Brahma Kumaris is a specialized initiative aimed at guiding political leaders toward principled, value-based leadership rooted in spirituality. This wing offers spiritual education and practical tools to help politicians navigate the challenges of governance with integrity, compassion, and a sense of service to the nation and humanity 
Brahma Kumaris
.

üåü Objectives of the Politicians‚Äô Service Wing

Spiritual Education: Provide meditation and self-awareness practices to help leaders reconnect with their inner values.

Principled Leadership: Encourage politicians to lead with dedication and principles, transforming politics into a service for the nation and humanity 
Brahma Kumaris | Official
.

#medical #health #bkshivani #meditation #brahmakumaris #healing 

The Medical Wing of the Brahma Kumaris, officially known as the Raja Yoga Education and Research Foundation (RERF), is a pioneering initiative that integrates spiritual practices with modern healthcare to promote holistic well-being. Established in 1985, it operates as one of the 20 service wings of the Brahma Kumaris, with over 3,000 members including doctors, nurses, and paramedical staff 

Core Philosophy and Approach

The Medical Wing emphasizes that "dis-ease" originates in the spirit. It advocates for a spiritually empowered approach to medicine, incorporating meditation and spiritual practices to enhance an individual's resistance to negative influences and promote self-respect and purposefulness. This approach aims to strengthen the will and build character, thereby improving overall health 

Key Initiatives and Programs

Mind-Body Medicine Conferences: These conferences focus on the integration of spiritual practices with medical knowledge to promote a healthy and balanced lifestyle 
bkmedicalwing.org
.

Health Fairs and De-Addiction Camps: Organized across India, these events aim to raise awareness about healthy lifestyles, stress management, and the dangers of addiction. Campaigns like ‚ÄúMy India, Healthy India‚Äù and ‚ÄúNasha Mukt Bharat‚Äù have reached millions, promoting positive thinking and holistic healing 

GITA (Global Initiative for Tobacco Awareness): This initiative focuses on spreading health awareness and encouraging individuals to quit tobacco use 

Research Projects: The Medical Wing conducts research into the psychophysiology of Rajyoga meditation and its application in the prevention of sickness and promotion of health 

Services and Support

The Medical Wing offers in-house services that introduce a spiritually augmented healthy lifestyle, known as the Raja Yogi Lifestyle, to clients. These services aim to promote overall well-being through the integration of spiritual practices and healthy living 

Global Reach and Impact

With a presence in over 140 countries, the Brahma Kumaris' medical initiatives have become a beacon of peace and stability, especially in times of stress and chaos. Their centers, such as the Global Hospital & Research Centre in Mount Abu, Rajasthan, provide a spiritually empowered medical environment where staff and patients alike benefit from regular meditation practices

The Medical Wing of the Brahma Kumaris, officially known as the Raja Yoga Education and Research Foundation (RERF), is a pioneering initiative that integrates spiritual practices with modern healthcare to promote holistic well-being. Core Philosophy and Approach

The Medical Wing emphasizes that "dis-ease" originates in the spirit. The Politicians‚Äô Service Wing (PSW) of the Brahma Kumaris is a specialized initiative aimed at guiding political leaders toward principled, value-based leadership rooted in spirituality. This wing offers spiritual education and practical tools to help politicians navigate the challenges of governance with integrity, compassion, and a sense of service to the nation and humanity 
Brahma Kumaris
.

üåü Objectives of the Politicians‚Äô Service Wing

Spiritual Education: Provide meditation and self-awareness practices to help leaders reconnect with their inner values.

Principled Leadership: Encourage politicians to lead with dedication and principles, transforming politics into a service for the nation and humanity 
Brahma Kumaris | Official
.

Holistic Development: Offer programs that promote mental clarity, emotional resilience, and ethical decision-making.

üßò‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Programs and Activities

The PSW organizes various events and conferences to engage political leaders in discussions on morality and spirituality in politics. For instance, the Politicians Service Wing Conference at Anand Sarovar from 13 - 16 September 2024 focused on these themes 
politicianswing.bk.ooo
.

Spiritual Healing - ‡§Ü‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§â‡§™‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ - BK Shivani I Medical Wing I Gyan Sarovar I 13/9/2025

#medical #health #bkshivani #meditation #brahmakumaris #healing 

The Medical Wing of the Brahma Kumaris, officially known as the Raja Yoga Education and Research Foundation (RERF), is a pioneering initiative that integrates spiritual practices with modern healthcare to promote holistic well-being. Established in 1985, it operates as one of the 20 service wings of the Brahma Kumaris, with over 3,000 members including doctors, nurses, and paramedical staff 

Core Philosophy and Approach

The Medical Wing emphasizes that "dis-ease" originates in the spirit. It advocates for a spiritually empowered approach to medicine, incorporating meditation and spiritual practices to enhance an individual's resistance to negative influences and promote self-respect and purposefulness. This approach aims to strengthen the will and build character, thereby improving overall health 

Key Initiatives and Programs

Mind-Body Medicine Conferences: These conferences focus on the integration of spiritual practices with medical knowledge to promote a healthy and balanced lifestyle 
bkmedicalwing.org
.

Health Fairs and De-Addiction Camps: Organized across India, these events aim to raise awareness about healthy lifestyles, stress management, and the dangers of addiction. Campaigns like ‚ÄúMy India, Healthy India‚Äù and ‚ÄúNasha Mukt Bharat‚Äù have reached millions, promoting positive thinking and holistic healing 

GITA (Global Initiative for Tobacco Awareness): This initiative focuses on spreading health awareness and encouraging individuals to quit tobacco use 

Research Projects: The Medical Wing conducts research into the psychophysiology of Rajyoga meditation and its application in the prevention of sickness and promotion of health 

Services and Support

The Medical Wing offers in-house services that introduce a spiritually augmented healthy lifestyle, known as the Raja Yogi Lifestyle, to clients. These services aim to promote overall well-being through the integration of spiritual practices and healthy living 

Global Reach and Impact

With a presence in over 140 countries, the Brahma Kumaris' medical initiatives have become a beacon of peace and stability, especially in times of stress and chaos. Their centers, such as the Global Hospital & Research Centre in Mount Abu, Rajasthan, provide a spiritually empowered medical environment where staff and patients alike benefit from regular meditation practices
Brahma Kumaris is a worldwide spiritual movement led by women, dedicated to personal transformation and world renewal through Rajyoga Meditation. Founded in India in 1937, Brahma Kumaris has spread to over 110 countries on all continents and has had an extensive impact in many sectors as an international NGO.

.

.

Holistic Development: Offer programs that promote mental clarity, emotional resilience, and ethical decision-making.

description:
Miracles of Meditation | ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ö‡§Æ‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞  -Dr. Swaminathan I Medical Wing I Gyan Sarovar I 13 Sept.

#medical #health #bkshivani #meditation #brahmakumaris #healing 

The Medical Wing of the Brahma Kumaris, officially known as the Raja Yoga Education and Research Foundation (RERF), is a pioneering initiative that integrates spiritual practices with modern healthcare to promote holistic well-being. Established in 1985, it operates as one of the 20 service wings of the Brahma Kumaris, with over 3,000 members including doctors, nurses, and paramedical staff 

Core Philosophy and Approach

The Medical Wing emphasizes that "dis-ease" originates in the spirit. It advocates for a spiritually empowered approach to medicine, incorporating meditation and spiritual practices to enhance an individual's resistance to negative influences and promote self-respect and purposefulness. This approach aims to strengthen the will and build character, thereby improving overall health 

Key Initiatives and Programs

Mind-Body Medicine Conferences: These conferences focus on the integration of spiritual practices with medical knowledge to promote a healthy and balanced lifestyle 
bkmedicalwing.org
.

Health Fairs and De-Addiction Camps: Organized across India, these events aim to raise awareness about healthy lifestyles, stress management, and the dangers of addiction. Campaigns like ‚ÄúMy India, Healthy India‚Äù and ‚ÄúNasha Mukt Bharat‚Äù have reached millions, promoting positive thinking and holistic healing 

GITA (Global Initiative for Tobacco Awareness): This initiative focuses on spreading health awareness and encouraging individuals to quit tobacco use 

Research Projects: The Medical Wing conducts research into the psychophysiology of Rajyoga meditation and its application in the prevention of sickness and promotion of health 

Services and Support

The Medical Wing offers in-house services that introduce a spiritually augmented healthy lifestyle, known as the Raja Yogi Lifestyle, to clients. These services aim to promote overall well-being through the integration of spiritual practices and healthy living 

Global Reach and Impact

With a presence in over 140 countries, the Brahma Kumaris' medical initiatives have become a beacon of peace and stability, especially in times of stress and chaos. Their centers, such as the Global Hospital & Research Centre in Mount Abu, Rajasthan, provide a spiritually empowered medical environment where staff and patients alike benefit from regular meditation practices
Brahma Kumaris is a worldwide spiritual movement led by women, dedicated to personal transformation and world renewal through Rajyoga Meditation. Founded in India in 1937, Brahma Kumaris has spread to over 110 countries on all continents and has had an extensive impact in many sectors as an international NGO.

title: Power of Self-Realization - BK Sheilu I Medical Wing I Gyan Sarovar I Mt. Abu I Raj I 12/09/2025
description:
Power of Self-Realization - BK Sheilu I Medical Wing I Gyan Sarovar I Mt. Abu I Raj I 12/09/2025

#medical #health #bkshivani #meditation #brahmakumaris #healing 

The Medical Wing of the Brahma Kumaris, officially known as the Raja Yoga Education and Research Foundation (RERF), is a pioneering initiative that integrates spiritual practices with modern healthcare to promote holistic well-being. Established in 1985, it operates as one of the 20 service wings of the Brahma Kumaris, with over 3,000 members including doctors, nurses, and paramedical staff 

Core Philosophy and Approach

The Medical Wing emphasizes that "dis-ease" originates in the spirit. It advocates for a spiritually empowered approach to medicine, incorporating meditation and spiritual practices to enhance an individual's resistance to negative influences and promote self-respect and purposefulness. This approach aims to strengthen the will and build character, thereby improving overall health 

Key Initiatives and Programs

Mind-Body Medicine Conferences: These conferences focus on the integration of spiritual practices with medical knowledge to promote a healthy and balanced lifestyle 
bkmedicalwing.org
.

Health Fairs and De-Addiction Camps: Organized across India, these events aim to raise awareness about healthy lifestyles, stress management, and the dangers of addiction. Campaigns like ‚ÄúMy India, Healthy India‚Äù and ‚ÄúNasha Mukt Bharat‚Äù have reached millions, promoting positive thinking and holistic healing 

GITA (Global Initiative for Tobacco Awareness): This initiative focuses on spreading health awareness and encouraging individuals to quit tobacco use 

Research Projects: The Medical Wing conducts research into the psychophysiology of Rajyoga meditation and its application in the prevention of sickness and promotion of health 

Services and Support

The Medical Wing offers in-house services that introduce a spiritually augmented healthy lifestyle, known as the Raja Yogi Lifestyle, to clients. These services aim to promote overall well-being through the integration of spiritual practices and healthy living 

Global Reach and Impact

With a presence in over 140 countries, the Brahma Kumaris' medical initiatives have become a beacon of peace and stability, especially in times of stress and chaos. Their centers, such as the Global Hospital & Research Centre in Mount Abu, Rajasthan, provide a spiritually empowered medical environment where staff and patients alike benefit from regular meditation practices
Brahma Kumaris is a worldwide spiritual movement led by women, dedicated to personal transformation and world renewal through Rajyoga Meditation. Founded in India in 1937, Brahma Kumaris has spread to over 110 countries on all continents and has had an extensive impact in many sectors as an international NGO.

title: "‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§Ø‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡§æ"- BK Shivani I Medical Wing I Mt. Abu | 12/9/2025
description:
Leading Health Care Through Self Care - BK Shivani I Medical Wing I Gyan Sarovar I Mt. Abu 12/9/2025

#medical #health #bkshivani #meditation #brahmakumaris #healing 

The Medical Wing of the Brahma Kumaris, officially known as the Raja Yoga Education and Research Foundation (RERF), is a pioneering initiative that integrates spiritual practices with modern healthcare to promote holistic well-being. Established in 1985, it operates as one of the 20 service wings of the Brahma Kumaris, with over 3,000 members including doctors, nurses, and paramedical staff 

Core Philosophy and Approach

The Medical Wing emphasizes that "dis-ease" originates in the spirit. It advocates for a spiritually empowered approach to medicine, incorporating meditation and spiritual practices to enhance an individual's resistance to negative influences and promote self-respect and purposefulness. This approach aims to strengthen the will and build character, thereby improving overall health 

Key Initiatives and Programs

Mind-Body Medicine Conferences: These conferences focus on the integration of spiritual practices with medical knowledge to promote a healthy and balanced lifestyle 
bkmedicalwing.org
.

Health Fairs and De-Addiction Camps: Organized across India, these events aim to raise awareness about healthy lifestyles, stress management, and the dangers of addiction. Campaigns like ‚ÄúMy India, Healthy India‚Äù and ‚ÄúNasha Mukt Bharat‚Äù have reached millions, promoting positive thinking and holistic healing 

GITA (Global Initiative for Tobacco Awareness): This initiative focuses on spreading health awareness and encouraging individuals to quit tobacco use 

Research Projects: The Medical Wing conducts research into the psychophysiology of Rajyoga meditation and its application in the prevention of sickness and promotion of health 

Services and Support

The Medical Wing offers in-house services that introduce a spiritually augmented healthy lifestyle, known as the Raja Yogi Lifestyle, to clients. These services aim to promote overall well-being through the integration of spiritual practices and healthy living 

Global Reach and Impact

With a presence in over 140 countries, the Brahma Kumaris' medical initiatives have become a beacon of peace and stability, especially in times of stress and chaos. Their centers, such as the Global Hospital & Research Centre in Mount Abu, Rajasthan, provide a spiritually empowered medical environment where staff and patients alike benefit from regular meditation practices

description:
Educators Conference

Transformative Session on
Divine Healing with the Power of Meditation

üïì 6 Sep 2025 at 4 PM
üìç  Ambedkar International Centre, New Delhi

-----------------------
#health #care #motivation #brahmakumaris #mindset 

The role of thought in our health is profound. Our mental processes‚Äîwhat and how we think‚Äîcan significantly influence our physical, emotional, and psychological well-being. Here's a breakdown of how thoughts affect health:

1. Thoughts Influence Emotions

Your thoughts shape how you feel. For example:

Thinking, ‚ÄúI can‚Äôt handle this,‚Äù may trigger anxiety or stress.

Thinking, ‚ÄúThis is tough, but I‚Äôll manage,‚Äù promotes resilience and calmness.

üëâ Emotions have a direct link to physiological responses‚Äîlike heart rate, muscle tension, or hormone levels.

 2. Mind-Body Connection

The brain and body communicate constantly. Thoughts can trigger:

Stress response (fight or flight): Negative or fearful thoughts activate cortisol and adrenaline.

Relaxation response: Positive or calming thoughts encourage the body to relax, lowering blood pressure and improving immune function.
3. Cognitive Patterns and Chronic Illness

Unhealthy thought patterns (like rumination, pessimism, or catastrophic thinking) have been linked to:

Increased risk of cardiovascular disease

Weakened immune system

Slower healing and recovery

Higher perception of pain

4. Mental Health and Physical Health

Negative thinking is a hallmark of mental health conditions like depression and anxiety, which can manifest physically:

Fatigue, insomnia

Appetite changes

Weakened immunity

Increased risk of chronic diseases

üîπ 5. Positive Thinking and Health Benefits

Research in positive psychology shows that optimistic, hopeful, and solution-focused thinking can:

Lower stress levels

Improve coping skills

Enhance longevity

Strengthen the immune system

Improve heart health

title: Introducing SIT Consciousness #JustSIT
description:
üåü We often speak of wanting to change our approach to life or bring about meaningful transformation. This could be that very opportunity to work on ourselves!

The Brahma Kumaris United Nations team is excited to announce a transformative global initiative: 30-Day SIT Consciousness Journey!

Who can participate:  
Anyone above 18 years old! Your friends, co-workers, and family members can also join in. Encourage everyone to be part of this journey together.

What is SIT?  
SIT = Soul, Instrument, Trustee. These are three powerful facets of consciousness to help awaken your highest potential and cultivate inner peace, purposeful impact, and generosity of spirit‚Äîusing daily awareness practices, customized meditation commentaries, and journaling reflections.

How to participate:  
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Just a mobile phone is needed (tablet/computer also works)  
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Learn more and join the project at: www.Justsit.world

Share the vibe:  
Encourage everyone you know to join‚Äîspread the word! Share your journey with friends and on social media. Invite others to #SITConsciousness and #JustSIT, and link to www.justsit.world.

Register now: www.justsit.world
Let's SIT together for a better world! ‚ú®

‚ñ∫Copyright : Brahma Kumaris

Brahma Kumaris is a worldwide spiritual movement led by women, dedicated to personal transformation and world renewal through Rajyoga Meditation. Founded in India in 1937, Brahma Kumaris has spread to over 110 countries on all continents and has had an extensive impact in many sectors as an international NGO.

title: Avnish Goyal Founder & Chair at Hallmark Care Homes (London) sharing his Experience @ Brahma Kumaris
description:
My name is Avnish Goyal, and I'm from London, UK. It's been an incredible experience at the Brahma Kumaris center here in Mount Abu. We've come from London, and I've been on and off involved with the Brahma Kumaris for the last 46‚Äì47 years, and this is my first experience here‚Äîand it's absolutely awesome. We've had an amazing three days.

Learning so much about our spiritual journey, and I can't wait to take this back to London to share with family members‚Äîand also the learnings we've gained, just about simple things like how to stay calm, how to meditate, and just look at our values and our virtues and practice them to become a better version of ourselves each and every day. I'm looking forward to spreading that message when we get back to London, and seeing whether we can get more of our community involved in this teaching, which is so important for today's society.

"Life-changing"‚ÄîI think‚Äîis a word that sometimes gets overused, but definitely here, all the little things I've learned will have a big impact over a long period of time.

Experience with Brahma Kumaris : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5kAxoG6fPDiwXXVagF8qFx_iIqqdvX1w

title: Shikha Jain From Tynor Orthotics  Sharing Her Experience at Brahma Kumaris Gyan Sarovar
description:
Om Shanti, mera naam Shikha hai and I am an HR professional. This is what I knew before I came for this retreat. But what I have learnt now is that I am a soul, and every person is a soul.
Once I came here, mujhe realize hua this is the only organization wherein everybody is so dedicatedly working for the welfare of others. By welfare, I mean they want everybody to lead a life in a better way.
You know, we are all running behind so many things in life, but we have forgotten to think of our own selves. Aur ye jo retreat tha ‚ÄîEmpowering Your Own Self ‚Äî actually it was Empowering. It has really empowered me to an extent that main bhool gayi thi hansna Shayad. pata nahi kitne mahine ya saalon ke baad, maine itna zyada smile kiya. Aur itna sara peace maine apne andar sense out kiya.
The professional world has led us to just forget our own selves ‚Äî office, ghar, sab kuch ‚Äî aur hum shayad bahut blame karte rehte hain sabko. Bhool jaate hain jo is session ne sikhaya, ki hum apne aap hi sab kuch control kar sakte hain.
Itna kuch hai, hum sirf apne aap ko hi nahi... We stop living a life thinking bahar, outer world is something which is more important. But actually this session teaches us ki humare andar hi sab kuch hai ‚Äî those virtues, we are inside us. We can enlighten those virtues and live a life. And stop blaming others.
Rather, we can not only make ourselves happy, but we can make everybody happy around us and lead a life for us and for our family in a much, much better way.
So I think I am very, very grateful. My life will be very different once I reach back home and in my office ‚Äî how am I gonna deal with my colleagues, my bosses ‚Äî thinking that everybody is a soul, everybody is a light, and that light should be enlightened.
And I think maybe I can be one carrier to help everybody.
Thank you so much.Om Shanti.

Experience with Brahma Kumaris : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5kAxoG6fPDiwXXVagF8qFx_iIqqdvX1w

title: SISTER JAYANTI and VUSI THEMBEKWAYO in conversation: I Am Because We Are... | 1 June 2025 | 3PM SAST
description:
I Am Because We Are...
Are you ready to walk your own path?

Unlock your true potential and shape the future you want to live in

Join us for an afternoon that could redefine the way you see yourself and the world.

I am because we are...

Unleash Your Potential with Living Legends

VUSI THEMBEKWAYO

Vusi Thembekwayo is a prominent South African entrepreneur venture capitalist author and global business speaker renowned for his dynamic leadership and commitment to empowering African businesses.

in conversation with

SR JAYANTI

Sister Jayanti Kirpalani is a distinguished spiritual leader educator and international speaker serving as the Additional Administrative Head of the Brahma Kumaris the world's largest spiritual organization led by women.With over five decades of dedication to spiritual teaching and humanitarian service she has become a prominent voice in global dialogues on spirituality peace and environmental sustainability.

www.brahmakumaris.org.za

title: Balance Sheet of Life - BK Shivani I Jurists Wing I Gyan Sarovar #bkshivani #lifelessons #motivation
description:
#bkshivani #meditation #motivation #life #positivevibes #positivethinking 

Balance Sheet Of Life - B.K. Shivani I Jurists Wing I Gyan Sarovar I Mt. Abu I Raj I 30/05/2025

Raja‚Äô means ruler and ‚ÄòYoga‚Äô refers to ‚Äòcommunion‚Äô. So, Rajyoga is a divine communion which makes us self sovereign. Meditation comes from the Latin word- Mederi which means to heal. Rajyoga Meditation is thus a self-healing process. By practicing it, our eyes open to a totally new world- a world inside, activating our dormant inner energies in the form of powers and nourishing the spiritual awareness of the self, Supreme, time and world. Once we start exploring this inner world, we find the root of our problems and also the key to their solutions. We start to respond to situations, rather than just reacting to them and begin to live in harmony.
It is an easy and natural way of meditation without rituals or mantras or postures and can be practised anywhere and anytime with ‚Äòopen eyes‚Äô, which makes it a versatile and universal practice. But sometimes getting started needs a little explanation. Here is a simple five-step process to follow. Soon you‚Äôll arrive at the quiet still place with just a single stride ‚Äì a single thought ‚Äì and you won‚Äôt even need to take five steps.

title: SISTER JAYANTI and SHAKES DLUTLU in Conversation: Its About Time...| 29 May 2025 | 10:00PM IST
description:
Its About Time...to learn spiritual tools to stay calm in crisis.
Are you facing big questions about life, the future, and your place in the world?

Then don't miss this inspiring, energising event for people who are ready to shape a better future!

In a world dominated by fear, violence and turmoil, we yearn for a voice of peace, truth and love. 

For decades, Sr Jayanti has been an emissary for peace, creating awareness that the root of all social ills is an erosion of spirituality in society. Meet her in South Africa as she engages with Shakes Dlutlu. Shakes is a young South African motivational speaker and facilitator of group processes whose mission is to empower people to believe in themselves. Both Sr Jayanti and Shakes will engage on how we can make meaning of the times we are in and rise above the turmoil with dignity, strength and courage.

www.brahmakumaris.org.za

#bkjayanti

title: Meditation is the power that first establishes trust - BK Mohini Didi - Brahma Kumaris
description:
Meditation is the power that first establishes trust ‚Äî trust in the self, trust in God, and then trust in others. When hearts are filled with trust, unity naturally follows. This is the true beauty of meditation ‚Äî it dissolves differences and connects hearts.

‚Äî Rajyogini BK Mohini Didi, Chief of Brahma Kumaris

title: Moments & Memories - Empowering the Self Retreat - April 2025 - Brahma Kumaris - Gyan Sarovar
description:
The Brahma Kumaris Headquarters at Gyan Sarovar, Mount Abu hosted a powerful spiritual retreat for global IT leaders from 10th to 13th April 2025. This unique gathering brought together over 300 senior professionals from more than 70 renowned companies across the world, all with a shared intent: to pause, reflect, and reconnect with their inner self.

In today‚Äôs fast-paced tech-driven world, leadership demands not just intelligence, but emotional resilience, spiritual clarity, and inner strength. This retreat offered just that ‚Äî a rare opportunity for leaders to step back from their roles and rediscover their role as a soul.

Highlights of the Retreat:

Guided Rajyoga Meditation Sessions that brought stillness and mental clarity
Keynote sessions by senior Rajyogis on leadership, values, and decision-making through spiritual intelligence
Dialogue circles and experience sharing among leaders from top tech firms
Nature walks, soulful music, and digital detox amidst the Aravalli hills
Personal interactions with senior BK mentors for deeper insights on karma, mind, and relationships
The retreat echoed with stillness, strength, and silence, leaving participants rejuvenated and inspired to bring values-based leadership back to their companies.

All Video Playlist - Empowering the Self Retreat:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5kAxoG6fPDjGCyWxIfYgMuo0dqEoByiN

The next edition of the IT Leaders Retreat will be announced soon. Those who missed this rare spiritual experience are encouraged to join next time for a journey within ‚Äî from the world of code to the core of the self.
https://bkitwing.org

üïäÔ∏è Gyan Sarovar ‚Äì Where Technology Meets Tranquility.

More such videos : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5kAxoG6fPDiwXXVagF8qFx_iIqqdvX1w

title: ABCs of Breast Cancer - What every Woman must know | Dr. P. Raghu Ram OBE | International Womens Day
description:
0:00 - English
38:28 - Hindi

To coincide with the 50th anniversary of #InternationalWomensDay, in an earnest endeavour to reach out globally across 130 countries, Ushalakshmi Breast Cancer Foundation and KIMS-USHALAKSHMI Centre for Breast Diseases based out of Hyderabad in partnership with Brahma Kumaris is hosting an awareness Session on ‚ÄúABCs of Breast Cancer - What every woman must know‚Äù

Date & Time : Saturday, 8 March 2025, 5:30 p.m.

Aims of this initiative:

‚Ä¢ Address the ‚Äòtaboo‚Äô issue‚Äô surrounding Breast Cancer
‚Ä¢ Empower women about the importance of EARLY DETECTION 
‚Ä¢ Demystify common myths associated with breast cancer backed with evidence based facts 
‚Ä¢ Emphasise the importance of annual Screening Mammograms for women over 40 
‚Ä¢ Provide the much-needed inner strength to those fighting the disease

SPEAKER
Dr. P. Raghu Ram OBE
Padma Shri & Dr. B.C. Roy National awardee
Officer of the Most Excellent Order of British Empire

Founding Director
KIMS-USHALAKSHMI Centre for Breast Diseases
KIMS Hospitals, Hyderabad, India

Founder & Chairman
Ushalakshmi Breast cancer Foundation, Hyderabad, India

More about the Speaker ‚Äì LINK
https://youtu.be/zJLjGtpa0tQ?si=b0w5L4VKsnW32I3V

A GUINNESS RECORD ATTEMPT
‚ÄúMost views for a Breast Cancer awareness Lesson on YouTube in 24 hours‚Äù

Let's stand together to protect the health and well-being of women worldwide. üíï 
DOES YOUR HEART BEAT FOR EARLY DETECTION OF BREAST CANCER?

#WomensHealth #brahmakumaris #breastcanceradvocacy #Earlydetectionsaveslives

description:

title: World Meditation Day from UK  | Live with Sister Jayanti - Brahma Kumaris
description:
This 21st December will be the first ever United Nations designated World Meditation Day. The Winter Solstice Day will see people around the globe united in meditation for inner peace and global harmony, to honour the adoption of this groundbreaking resolution. 

The UN maintains that modern science confirms the numerous benefits of meditation, and its profound impact on our lives. It is rooted in ancient practices and is an effective tool to achieve inner transformation and peace in the modern day.

title: Srishti Mahajan | Living a Spiritual Life in a Modern World  | Empowering the Self | Experience
description:
In this heartfelt video, Srishti Mahajan, a professional in the renewable energy sector with the Indian government, shares her transformative experience at a Brahma Kumaris retreat. Initially unsure of what to expect, Srishti and her family embarked on this journey with open minds, hoping for a change in the way they lead their lives.

After three days of immersion in morning meditation sessions and meaningful interactions with fellow participants, Srishti reflects on the key takeaway from the retreat: it was both inspirational and transformational. The teachings she received, though familiar from her childhood through satsangs and the wisdom of her grandparents, were now presented with logic, structure, and real-life examples, making them more impactful than ever.

One of the most eye-opening aspects of the retreat was learning that it is possible to live a spiritually fulfilled life while actively participating in society, as demonstrated by a doctor who balances both worlds beautifully. This new understanding left Srishti with a strong sense of faith and belief in the Brahma Kumaris community and their mission to help individuals reconnect with the core values they've lost on their journey.

Srishti expresses deep gratitude towards the sevadharis (volunteers) who patiently answered her many questions, and she looks forward to integrating the valuable lessons from this retreat into her daily life. Join Srishti in this inspiring reflection on spiritual growth, self-discovery, and the power of community.

title: Shivangi Bhayana | A Spiritual Experience : Connecting Through Silence and Music | Mansarovar
description:
In this inspiring video, Shivangi Bhayana shares her transformative experience at a retreat held at Man Sarovar, a campus of the Brahma Kumaris headquarters. She reflects on the profound concept of silence as a language, emphasizing its importance in communication and self-expression.

Shivangi discusses how often we express ourselves verbally, yet there's an unspoken depth that silence can convey. Her retreat experience, her first ever, was truly life-changing. With enlightening talks from various speakers, including Bala bhai, BK Usha Didi, and BK Asha Didi, each session offered unique insights and teachings that left her feeling blessed and enriched.

Particularly moving were BK Shivani Didi's talks, which recharged her spirit and provided fresh perspectives every time she listened. Shivangi also delves into the relationship between silence and music, highlighting how music, despite being sound, can evoke peace and serve as a form of meditation. As a musician, she expresses how music connects her to a higher power, aligning closely with the serenity of silence.

Join us as Shivangi explores these themes of silence, music, and spirituality, and discover how they can enhance your own connection to the divine. Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more uplifting content!

title: Promo | Climate Wisdom Live Series from COP 29 in Baku | Brahma Kumaris
description:
Brahma Kumaris presents the *Climate Wisdom Live Series*, a daily broadcast from the global COP 29 summit in Baku, uniting spiritual insights and scientific expertise on climate change. Each episode will feature Brahma Kumaris delegates sharing unique perspectives on how *consciousness can transform our approach to climate challenges*.

Date: 11th nov to 22nd Nov 2024
Time: 7 PM (AZT) | 3 PM (GMT) | 8:30 PM (IST) | 10 AM (EDT)

Highlights:
- Thought-provoking discussions with global leaders in spirituality and environmental science.
- Practical wisdom to inspire personal responsibility and positive action for our planet.
- Insights into how mindfulness, inner peace, and sustainable practices impact the environment.

Tune in daily for real-time updates, reflections, and a new vision for a sustainable world. Let‚Äôs elevate the climate conversation together!

Stay Connected | Subscribe Now to follow our journey at COP 29 and discover how inner transformation can drive lasting environmental change.

title: Diwali 2024: Lighting the Path to the Golden Age | Brahma Kumaris
description:
‚ú® Diwali 2024: A Path to the Golden Age ‚ú®

Join us as we celebrate Diwali, the festival of lights, with a unique perspective from Brahma Kumaris. Diwali symbolizes the victory of light over darkness, knowledge over ignorance, and peace over chaos. In this video, we explore how these timeless values pave the way to a "Golden Age," a vision of harmony, purity, and unity for all.

Discover the spiritual significance of Diwali through the lens of the Golden Age, where each soul reclaims its purest, most divine form. Let this be a reminder that each light lit this Diwali represents a personal commitment to peace, love, and truth.

üîî Don‚Äôt forget to like, subscribe, and share to spread this message of light and positivity. Let‚Äôs create a brighter world together!

This closing session brings together distinguished spiritual leaders and esteemed guests to reflect on the key insights shared throughout the summit and explore how science and spirituality can work hand in hand for a sustainable future.

title: Antim Yatra BK Nirwair Ji | 22 Dec Awakening TV | Brahma Kumaris
description:

title: Meditate with Sister Jayanti | International Day of Peace 2024 | Brahma Kumaris - Cultivating Peace
description:
Join us for a special meditation session led by Sister Jayanti, Additional Administrative Head of the Brahma Kumaris, as we come together to honor the "International Day of Peace 2024". This global event invites you to reflect, meditate, and cultivate inner peace, contributing to a world of harmony and understanding. 

üïí Live on Saturday, 21st September 2024
- 7:00 PM India
- 2:30 PM UK
- 9:30 AM New York
- 5:30 PM Dubai

Together, let's nurture a culture of peace through meditation.

Nestled in the serene valley of the Himalayas, Brahma Kumaris Gyan Sarovar Academy in Nagarkot, Nepal, offers a tranquil retreat for meditation and self-discovery. Surrounded by breathtaking mountain views, this beautiful center invites visitors to experience inner peace and spiritual growth through the teachings of Raja Yoga meditation. A true haven for those seeking clarity and connection, Gyan Sarovar Academy provides an idyllic setting for reflection and renewal amidst nature's splendor.

Address: Brahma Kumaris Gyan Sarovar Academy, Nagarkot, Kathmandu, Nepal

https://brahmakumarisnepal.org.np/

title: A Year of Spiritual Growth: Anup Dhingra‚Äôs Experience with Brahma Kumaris : Marsh India
description:
In this video, Anup Dhingra from Mumbai shares his experience with Brahma Kumaris. He and his wife Puja have been connected with us for the past year. Ano talks about how this journey started by chance and became something truly special.

Before joining Brahma Kumaris, Ano tried different spiritual practices But through Brahma Kumaris, he found a unique combination of knowledge, meditation, and the importance of helping others.

This experience taught him that life is not just about balancing time, but about balancing energy. When our energy is strong, we can do better in our work, our relationships, and in helping others.

He also shares how being part of Brahma Kumaris helped him realize that there is more to life than just seeking material success. Talking to others on this path, he learned the importance of making a positive impact, no matter how small our role might be.

We hope this story inspires you

To Learn Rajyoga Meditation, Visit Nearest Meditation Center
http://brahmakumaris.com/centers/

title: Subah - Satvic Movment - My Experience at Brahma Kumaris
description:
Join us on a heartfelt journey to the Mount Abu, the headquarters of the Brahma Kumaris, where we spent three transformative days. In this video, we share our profound experiences and the key takeaways that will stay with us for years to come.

From the moment we arrived, we were enveloped by the warmth and compassion of everyone we met, whether it was the sisters who helped maintain the campus or those who delivered insightful lectures. Their genuine love and dedication truly brought the spirit of the campus to life.

The serene environment, nestled amidst lush mountains, provided the perfect backdrop for deep meditation and self-reflection. It allowed us to disconnect from our busy lives and reconnect with our true selves. The teachings at the center, particularly the practice of Raj Yoga meditation, helped us explore profound truths about our identity and the nature of the soul.

We were also deeply moved by the Brothers and Sisters commitment to nurturing both the body and the spirit. The delicious and energizing food, prepared with love and intention, was a testament to this holistic approach. Our exploration of the various parts of the campus, including Shantivan, Tapovan, and Pandav Bhawan, revealed the rich history and dedication that have shaped this spiritual haven.

This experience has taught us that true empowerment comes from within, and we have the power to control our thoughts and emotions. We invite you to join us in this journey of self-discovery and peace, and encourage you to visit the Mount Abu Center to experience this divine energy firsthand.

title: Lily's Inward Journey | A Moment to Meditate | Short Animation Film | Brahmakumaris @brahmakumaris
description:
In the bustling city, Lily, a high-achieving young professional, seeks solace amid her fast paced chaotic life. With the devine blessings bestowed on her,  met a divine angel at Brahmakumaris. Lily discovers that true fulfillment lies in inner peace along with external success. Embracing the practice of pausing in her fast pace life, she finds serenity within herself, illuminating the transformative power of inner peace. "Taking a Pause" is a captivating animated journey depicting Lily's quest for harmony and inner peace amidst life's tumult.

www.shantisarovar.org

‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á, ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡§à ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á (x3)

--------------------------------

Nanhe nanhe haath humare, ambar tak le jayenge
Pyare pyare sare tare, hum jameen par layenge (x2)

Bharat naya banayenge, hum duniya nai banayenge (x3)

Hum phoolon sa, hai haste hain, kaliyon sa muskate hain
Hum bachche hi duniya ki bagiya ko mehakate hain

Swarnim bharat ke hum bachche, Asha aur vishvaas hain
Naye jagat ka likhane wale, hum ujjval itihaas hain (x2)
Jo koi na kar sakta hai, hum karke dikhlayenge
Bharat naya banayenge, hum duniya nai banayenge (x3)

Hum Prahlad, Dhruv, Nachiketa, kaal bhi humse hara hai
Thaan liya to, maan ke ishvar, sathi bana humara hai (x2)
Khuda dost ban, har sirahaane hum khushiyaan dhar aayenge
Bharat naya banayenge, hum duniya nai banayenge (x3)

Sachche sachche hai hum bachche, jhooth nahin hum kehte
Nanhe wahi farishte hum, haradam haste rehte

Mat samjho chhoti kaya, hum karne wale kamal hain
Nirmal hansi khushi se, jag karne wale khushhaal hain (x2)
Sabke sir par taj hoga, dev-devi ban jayenge
Bharat naya banayenge, hum duniya nai banayenge (x3)

title: Rajyoga Meditation takes you on a journey to the core of your being - Sudesh Didi #yogaday #idy2024
description:
Rajyoga Meditation takes you on a journey to the core of your being, revealing your true self and forging a deep connection with the Divine.

Join Rajyogini BK Sudesh Didi, Joint Administrative Head of the Brahma Kumaris, as she shares her profound wisdom.

title: Sister Jayanti's Greetings of Peace for World Environment Day 2024
description:
Join us as Sister Jayanti delivers a heartfelt greeting of peace on World Environment Day. üåç‚ú®

Brahma Kumaris is actively engaged in numerous environmental projects that contribute to the well-being of our planet. Discover initiatives like:

Kalptaruh: A movement focused on tree plantation to create a greener future.
Arogyavan: Healing places dedicated to restoring health through nature.
Yogik Farming: Innovative farming practices that promote soil restoration and use spiritual energy to nurture crops.
Sister Jayanti emphasizes the importance of ecosystem restoration and the crucial role each of us plays in protecting and nurturing our environment. Let's join hands and make a positive impact on our planet together.

For more information on our projects and how you can get involved, visit Brahma Kumaris Official Website.

#WorldEnvironmentDay #SisterJayanti #BrahmaKumaris #Kalptaruh #Arogyavan #YogikFarming #EcosystemRestoration #PeaceAndNature #EnvironmentalInitiatives #HealingTheEarth

title: Tobacco Kills - Dr. Sachin Parab's Message on World No-Tobacco Day - Brahma Kumaris
description:
On World No-Tobacco Day, join us in listening to an enlightening message from Dr. Sachin Parab, shedding light on the dangers of tobacco consumption and its detrimental effects on health. Dr. Parab, a renowned expert in public health, delivers a powerful discourse on the alarming statistics, health risks, and social impacts associated with tobacco use.

This insightful message aims to raise awareness and inspire positive change in individuals and communities worldwide. Together, let's take a stand against tobacco and strive for a healthier, tobacco-free future for all.

Watch the full video to gain valuable insights and join the movement towards a smoke-free world. Don't forget to like, share, and subscribe for more empowering content!

#WorldNoTobaccoDay #QuitSmoking #HealthAwareness #BrahmaKumaris #DrSachinParab #SayNoToTobacco

title: The Power of Peace: Reflective Experiences at Mount Abu : Empowering the Self Retreat
description:
üåü Ashish Kapoor & Meghana Kapoor credits their transformative experience to a visit to Mount Abu, which provided both knowledge and tools to live a more soul-conscious life.

üåø The serene environment of Mount Abu is highlighted as a place of peace and beauty, enhancing the collective meditation experience with its calming and inspiring atmosphere.

üç≤ Emphasis is placed on the unique dining experience where the food is described as delicious, light, yet fulfilling, and cooked with love, emotions, and blessings.

üôè The speaker appreciates the spiritual activities, especially the morning meditation session called "Amrit Vela" at 4:00 AM, which is pointed out as a game-changer for mental clarity and spiritual energy.

üë• Meeting new people and attending sessions at Mount Abu has significantly impacted him, providing new perspectives on handling life situations more effectively.

üôå The speaker expresses gratitude towards the individuals at the retreat, mentioning the positive energy and harmony that contributed to the blissful experience.

üí≠ The teachings from the retreat are praised for their practical application in everyday life, including techniques for energizing water and food, which are now daily practices.

This retreat not only enriched the speaker's personal life but also provided profound insights and tools that improved their professional and familial relationships.

All Session : 
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5kAxoG6fPDgsYPXo6aUl6x_hjkEhOpF0&si=HjpfNuhSPyBlFSlK

title: A Journey of Self-Discovery : Monica's Spiritual Awakening with Brahma Kumaris : Gyan Sarovar
description:
üåü Monica, based in Pune and working as a senior Power Platform consultant at Michelin, shares her spiritual journey.
üåü She discusses her self-reflection process, entering her 30s, and evaluating her inner and external life accomplishments.
üåü Inspired by her mother and aunt, Monica embarked on meditation and spirituality, experiencing a profound transformation.
üåü She describes her visit to a spiritual campus as a life-changing event, bringing inner peace and a sense of divine connection.
üåü Monica expresses gratitude towards her family and spiritual guides, committing to spread her newfound wisdom and experiences.

title: Moments & Memories - Empowering the Self Retreat - April 2024 - Brahma Kumaris - Gyan Sarovar
description:
üåü Experience the essence of leadership and spirituality in our exclusive 7-minute video from the serene Leadership Retreat for IT Professionals at Gyan Sarovar, Mount Abu. Dive into a series of enlightening sessions, heartfelt guidance, and inspiring leadership talks, all captured amidst the breathtaking surroundings of our beautiful campus.

All Video Playlist - Empowering the Self Retreat:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5kAxoG6fPDgsYPXo6aUl6x_hjkEhOpF0

üïØÔ∏è Witness the magic of group meditation in the amphitheater and park, where each participant meditated with a candle in hand during the enchanting evening hours. This video not only showcases the spiritual sessions but also highlights the tireless efforts of our volunteers in food preparation, stage setup, registration, and more, ensuring a flawless experience for all attendees.

üé• Relive the moments that touched the hearts of many and left a lasting impression. This is more than just a retreat; it's a journey into the heart of leadership and communal harmony. Don‚Äôt forget to like, comment, and share to keep the inspiration flowing!

title: Take a Pause | A Short Animation Film Towards Inner Peace | Brahma Kumaris | Pace, Pause, Peace
description:
"TAKE A PAUSE" | A Short Animation Film Towards Inner Peace | Pace, Pause, Peace

In the bustling city, Lily, a high-achieving young professional, seeks solace amid her fast paced chaotic life. With the devine blessings bestowed on her,  met a divine angel at Brahmakumaris. Lily discovers that true fulfillment lies in inner peace along with external success. Embracing the practice of pausing in her fast pace life, she finds serenity within herself, illuminating the transformative power of inner peace. "Taking a Pause" is a captivating animated journey depicting Lily's quest for harmony and inner peace amidst life's tumult

Created by: Brahma Kumaris Shanti Sarovar, Hyderabad

title: Brahma Kumaris Peace Village - Learning & Retreat Centre | USA @brahmakumaris
description:
Google Location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/BaPmuiSNZy279Rey7

Peace Village is one of the Brahma Kumaris Retreat Centres in the US. Situated on the Catskill Mountain in New York‚Äôs breath taking Hudson Valley, Peace Village is an ideal spot for those who seek silence, peace and spiritual learning. Due to it‚Äôs proximity to nature, one experiences an instant sense of tranquility and a feeling of one with nature after reaching the campus. The campus is spread across 6 building in 300 acres of woods and streams. Peace Village welcomes thousands of national and international visitors annually. Peace Village is located at 54 O‚Äôhara Rd., PO Box 99, Haines Falls, New York 

Website: http://www.peacevillageretreat.org/

#brahmakumaris  #peacevillage

title: Navsrijan - Aqua Laser Show | Teaser | Brahma Kumaris | Umesh Shukla, Ricky Kej
description:
#navsrijan #brahmakumaris #umeshshukla #brahmababa #founderofbrahmakumaris #biopic  
"Navsrijan - A Chronicle of Pitashri Brahma" is an Aqua Laser Show coming this summer at Brahma Kumaris' Prakashmani Wisdom Park at Abu Road, Rajasthan

For More information: https://pmwisdompark.com/

Produced by: Brahma Kumaris
In Association with: Merry Go Round Studios & Panther Studio

Director: Umesh Shukla
Music: Ricky Kej
Producer: BK Mruthyunjaya
Co Producer: Ashish Wagh & Sampada Wagh 
Cinematographer & Editor: Mayur Hardas
Lead Cast: Dharmendra Gohil, Anang Desai, Ridhi Shukla, Nitya Moyal
Costume Designer: Preeti Sharma
Hair & Makeup: Anita Matkar
Animation Head: Krunal Dave & Namanraj Shelat
Assistant Director: Deepak Chauhan
Production Controller: Manan Dave
Story, Screenplay & Dialogue: BK Harinder, BK Shivika, BK Burhan, BK Gaurav
Background Music Score: Ricky Kej
Music:  "Tere Charan mein Sharan aaya" - Sai-Piyush
"Chale hai Farishtey itihaas" Ricky Kej

Synopsis:
As the sun sets in Mount Abu, we‚Äôll take you on a breathtaking & enchanting 50 minutes ride of enlightenment which brings to life the ancient Indian values, culture & spiritual glory. This show will captivate you with its 60 ft wide Water screen, humongous 165ft wide Immersive wall screen, multi-colour lasers, video & light projections, musical fountain, underwater flames & surround sound symphony.
The Navsrijan show begins by taking you through the mythological period of Vedic India wherein Goddess Ganga descended on Earth. Soon thereafter, you experience the magnificent history of the Founding Father of Brahma Kumaris Pitashree Brahma Baba. 

@merrygoroundstudios7119  @RickyKejmusic @ThePantherStudio

#bkshivani #dadijanki #spirituality #sanatandharma #god #motivation #Dada Lekhraj #storyofbrahmababa #reels
